General.Name: Jiangxi Zhengbang Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Jiangxi Zhengbang Technology Co.Ltd. operates in the agricultural industry in China. The company offers rice, veterinary medicine, crop, feed, and pork products. It also develops, produces, and sells veterinary drugs, mixed feed additives, pre-mixed feed additives, and other products. In addition, the company engages in the feed production, pig breeding and breeding, pesticide production, and duck breeding activities. Jiangxi Zhengbang Technology Co.Ltd. was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Nanchang, China.
